author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of Tamil Nadu Revenue Village Employees’ Association along with their families, took out a rally here on Friday demanding the State government to implement time scale of pay for Village Assistants.

K. Siva Perumal, district president of the association, who led the rally, said that the government should also promote those Village Assistants who had served for long, as Village Administrative Officers.

Other vacancies must also be filled, he said.

The rally, which commenced near VAO Office at Korampallam and ended on the Collectorate premises, was flagged off by M. Rengaraj, former district president of the association.
title: Demand for time scale of pay
